creator: richard.zschech@cqrdata.com
text:
JSVGComponent packs its parent window when the gvt that it is displating has
been built.

This should not be done by the component. Expecially when its inbeded in an
internal frame on a desk top which packs to a tiny window.

If the user wants the window packed when the gvt is built they should add their
own listener.

This bug is fixed in CVS.
There is now a method JSVGComponent.setMySize(Dimension) that can easily be
overridden to call pack when a size change is requested by the SVG user agent.
